value.title: Storage requirements for AI, ML and analytics in 2022
value.excerpt: We look at what is needed for artificial intelligence and machine learning, and the pros and cons of block, file and object storage to store and access very large amounts of often unstructured data.

value.title: Tesla is aiming to start production of its Optimus humanoid robot in 2023
value.excerpt: Elon Musk gave a timeline to production for the first time for the Tesla Optimus project, a humanoid robot capable of doing general tasks. The CEO believes the company can bring the ambitious project to production as soon as next year.

value.title: FOCUS-Logistics giants hedge their bets in uncertain U.S. self-driving truck race
value.excerpt: U.S. self-driving truck companies have a golden opportunity in the form of a nationwide driver shortage, but their robot drivers still are not ready and neither are their biggest potential customers.

value.title: AI algorithms could disrupt our ability to think
